verse: यावान्वा अयमाकाशस्तावानेषोऽन्तर्हृदय आकाश उभे अस्मिन्द्यावापृथिवी अन्तरेव समाहिते उभावग्निश्च वायुश्च सूर्याचन्द्रमसावुभौ विद्युन्नक्षत्राणि यच्चास्येहास्ति यच्च नास्ति तदस्मिन् सर्वं समाहितम ईति॥
meaning: jitana vishaw hai, aur jo aap nahi dekh rahein hain anantkoti brahamand, anantkoti paramvyom vo sab isake andar hai is chote se ghar main vo daharakash hai
meaning-gpt: Translation:As long as the space extends, this inner space of the heart also extends in both heaven and earth, placed within. Both fire and wind, the sun and the moon, lightning and the stars, whatever exists and whatever does not exist, everything is contained within this inner space of the heart.

upnishad-org.meaning: As far as, verily, this great akasa extends, so far extends the akasa within the heart. Both heaven and earth are contained within it, both fire and air, both sun and moon, both lightning and stars; and whatever belongs to him (i.e. the embodied creature) in this world and whatever does not, all that is contained within it (i.e. the akasa in the heart)
